text: Moses suaŋgi tɨvi khaŋ nzuai, nza za mba tɨvi zɨn vui fhu, nza mbatɨgirga. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ nzan muungeŋ thav, nzan kurkurar zav, Krais kha zɨ ndigi. Mba zɨ khare, “Mbarɨgɨrga guma.” Ana mba zɨ ndigap, ana taagia nza ndigi. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Khanarareŋ ga tui gumgi, Fhe Bakɨme mbe garim, mbe za mbatɨgirga.”
